attributes.action: End modern day slavery that is prevalent in care work now
attributes.additional_details:
There are many private face book groups dedicated to try helping and educating carers 
Many stories of exploitation and abuse are discussed
attributes.background:
Hundreds of thousands of cares are been shamelessly exploited by the majority of care agencies ie no time sheets provided often we do not get breaks and often we are not paid for all the hours worked 
Carers are earning below minimum wage

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Breaches of employment regulations by agencies are already illegal.  You can find out more about rights here:

https://www.gov.uk/agency-workers-your-rights/your-rights-as-a-temporary-agency-worker

and find out about the Employment Agency Standards Inspectorate here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/employment-agency-standards-inspectorate
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
